r.s: Providing a somewhat unified API for handling
r.d: XML_Feed_Parser is a parser for (the various) RSS and Atom format XML feeds. It attempts to provide a somewhat unified API while still allowing access to the full details of each feed type.
r.n: First release candidate Fixed bug #6472 - wrong paths in require_once Fixed bug #6473 - missing files (for RSS1.1) Fixed bug #7849 - cannot validate RSS2 feeds - by bundling relax ng schemas Improved error handling when attributes empty Fixed loading of sample files in regression tests Implemented hasKey method for basic checking of whether an element exists
